rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature.
Grisly Display deals 1 damage to target creature and you gain that much life.
If this spell’s additional cost was paid, instead wound that creature, then Grisly Display deals 1 damage to that creature and you gain life equal to the damage dealt this way. [i](Until the end of your next turn, if a wounded creature would be dealt damage, it’s dealt that much damage plus one instead.)[/i]
